Body:
Description: Hello Team,

I have configured the CAP policy to include all browsers and have added the necessary files to the deny list. Now, I need to whitelist Google Drive and specific SharePoint URLs to allow users to upload files on these platforms.

I attempted to add the Google Drive URL to the allowlist and linked the list to the CAP policy, but it is not working for Google Drive. However, the same approach worked for Gmail.

Could you please suggest possible resolution steps?

Thank you for your support.

Best Regards,

Next Steps Updated: add the following to DPI allowlist
mail.google.com
doc.google.com
drive.google.com

What We've Learned Updated: customer's allowlist for gdrive not working
need to schedule remote session to go over their configuration
Invitation updated. Attendees: Botond Biro, Nayan Rajore
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed

What We've Learned Updated: - blocked every upload except certain sharepoint websites
- block is successful
Next Steps Updated: - waiting on the customer to test on sharepoint
